level.heading: Severability.
level.text: If any provision of this part or the application thereof to any person or circumstances is held invalid, the remainder of the part, and the application of such provision to other persons or circumstances shall not be affected thereby.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-171 enacted into law Part B of subchapter IV of Chapter 28 of Title 47.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-171, see notes under § 47-2884.01.
